description.p: Defines the space between the right edge of the frame and the object to the right of it.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Spacing right]* property can be used to increase the amout of space between the right edge of the frame and the item next to it, such as another control or the right side of the screen. Spacing is defined using CSS syntax. For example, 2in or 20px.
